name: part_004
file: tmp_【ラミィ生誕記念2022】今年も好き放題やります！100万円晩酌【 #やかまし100万円飲み会 ⧸ホロライブ】 [hzmimWcN34Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Lamy and the group are excited to see another high-end bottle of sake being presented.
A narrator introduces the next luxury food item: additive-free sea urchin (uni).
Lamy prepares to taste the sea urchin, taking a generous portion while the others watch in anticipation.
Lamy reacts to the rich taste of the sea urchin, noting how high-quality and fresh it is.
Lamy shares her impressions of the uni and mentions she's trying dried mullet roe (karasumi) for the first time.
Noel makes a joke about the mullet roe, personifying the fish, which Lamy finds funny and a bit distracting.
The group tries the karasumi, comparing its taste to salmon as they enjoy it with the expensive sake.
Korone confuses the roe with squid ink, while Noel praises how perfectly the roe pairs with the sake.
Korone starts to feel the effects of the alcohol, and the others notice her change in behavior.
In a tipsy state, Korone accidentally mistakes the soy sauce bottle for a drink, causing everyone to panic.
The narrator introduces a very rare 50-year-old sake that was stored in beer bottles in a cave.
The group is shocked to learn that this cave-aged sake also costs 300,000 yen.
They observe the distinct yellow color of the aged sake and discuss the characteristics of koshu (aged sake).
The group smells and tastes the aged sake, finding its surprising acidity similar to balsamic vinegar.
They toast with the rare sake, and Koyori provides a detailed, professional review of its flavor profile.
Lamy thanks everyone and announces that there's even more to come in the second half of the party.
Lamy introduces the next segment of the stream: a game of Twister to liven up the party.
The five VTubers gather on the Twister mat, ready to start the game.

subtitles.original: まだあるんだ。
subtitles.english: There's more.

subtitles.original: もう一つなんだ？
subtitles.english: Wait, there's another one?

subtitles.original: 口に入れた瞬間、とろける幸せ。
subtitles.english: Happiness that melts the moment you put it in your mouth.

subtitles.original: 続いては、海の幸から一級品のウニです。
subtitles.english: Next, a top-quality sea urchin from the sea.

subtitles.original: テッカテカだぁ〜！
subtitles.english: It's so shiny!

subtitles.original: ヤバッ！美味しそう！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Looks delicious!

subtitles.original: うわぁ、いい色ですね。
subtitles.english: Wow, what a beautiful color.

subtitles.original: すげぇ、食べたい！
subtitles.english: Amazing, I want to eat it!

subtitles.original: ラミィたん、先に食べな〜。
subtitles.english: Lamy-tan, you should eat first.

subtitles.original: そうそう。先にお願いします。
subtitles.english: Right, right. Please, go ahead.

subtitles.original: いいの？
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと、うにから...
subtitles.english: Then, from the sea urchin...

subtitles.original: ざばっと取って良い？
subtitles.english: Can I take a big scoop?

subtitles.original: あ、ごめんね、ちょっと見えないかもしれないけど。
subtitles.english: Ah, sorry, you might not be able to see it.

subtitles.original: どうですか？食べてみてくださいよ。
subtitles.english: How is it? Please, give it a try.
Mmm!!!

subtitles.original: どんな味？うに？
subtitles.english: How's the taste? Sea urchin?

subtitles.original: うにうにうに！うに味！
subtitles.english: Uni, uni, uni! It tastes like uni!

subtitles.original: 濃厚なうにの味。なんかさ、臭みが全然ない！！
subtitles.english: A rich sea urchin taste. Like, there's no fishy smell at all!!

subtitles.original: それは素晴らしい。さすがでございます。
subtitles.english: That's wonderful. As expected.

subtitles.original: 人生で初めて、からすみ食べてみようかな。
subtitles.english: I think I'll try karasumi for the first time in my life.

subtitles.original: 日本酒に合いますからね。あとでお酒を。
subtitles.english: It goes well with sake. Have some sake later.

subtitles.original: ぼくはボラ...
subtitles.english: I'm a mullet...

subtitles.original: ボラになるはずだった...
subtitles.english: I was supposed to be a mullet...

subtitles.original: そんな言い方したら食べづらいじゃないですか！！
subtitles.english: When you put it like that, it makes it hard to eat!!

subtitles.original: ぼくはボラ...
subtitles.english: I'm a mullet...

subtitles.original: あ、でも気にせず食べてます。
subtitles.english: Ah, but I'm eating without a care.

subtitles.original: さあ、感想はどうでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Now, what are your impressions?

subtitles.original: なんなんだろう、シャケみたい...
subtitles.english: What is this, it's like salmon...

subtitles.original: シャケ！？シャケなんだ。
subtitles.english: Salmon?! It's salmon.

subtitles.original: 卵なのに身みたいってこと？
subtitles.english: You mean it's like flesh even though it's roe?

subtitles.original: 逆にみんな、ちょっと食べてみて！
subtitles.english: Actually, everyone, give it a try!

subtitles.original: いただきまーす！
subtitles.english: Let's eat!

subtitles.original: はい、どうぞ、どうぞ。
subtitles.english: Yes, go ahead, go ahead.

subtitles.original: イカスミ...
subtitles.english: Squid ink...

subtitles.original: イカスミじゃない！イカスミじゃないです！
subtitles.english: It's not squid ink! It's not squid ink!

subtitles.original: からすみ！
subtitles.english: Karasumi!

subtitles.original: からすみ、からすみです。
subtitles.english: Karasumi, it's karasumi.

subtitles.original: どうかな？シャケっぽくない？魚、うん、うん。
subtitles.english: How is it? Doesn't it taste like salmon? Fish, yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: なんか止まってますけど大丈夫ですか？w
subtitles.english: You've kind of stopped moving, are you okay? lol

subtitles.original: え、これを、この高い日本酒でかきこむ、こうやって。
subtitles.english: Wait, you wash this down with this expensive sake, like this.

subtitles.original: どうですか？合いますか？
subtitles.english: How is it? Does it pair well?

subtitles.original: 濃厚で合う〜！！
subtitles.english: It's rich and it pairs so well!!

subtitles.original: 美味〜い！！
subtitles.english: Delicious!!

subtitles.original: 美味しすぎる。ころねさん！
subtitles.english: It's too delicious. Korone-san!

subtitles.original: あ、大丈夫です！あはははは！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm okay! Hahahaha!

subtitles.original: なんか、誰かに乗り移られたみたいな。
subtitles.english: It's like she's been possessed by someone.

subtitles.original: でも、これすごい飲みやすいよ！
subtitles.english: But, this is really easy to drink!

subtitles.original: ころね！？
subtitles.english: Korone!?

subtitles.original: 危ない、危ない。早いよ、早いよ。
subtitles.english: Watch out, watch out. You're going too fast, too fast.

subtitles.original: まだ始まったばっかだよ。
subtitles.english: It's only just started.

subtitles.original: コップ半分も飲んでないからね。
subtitles.english: You haven't even finished half a glass.

subtitles.original: うあそう...
subtitles.english: Oh, right...

subtitles.original: 醤油もいいよ。卵だもんね。
subtitles.english: Soy sauce is good too. Since it's roe.

subtitles.original: こよりもらいたい。
subtitles.english: I want Koyori's.

subtitles.original: あ、「こより」じゃねぇや。戌神ころね。
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm not "Koyori." I'm Inugami Korone.

subtitles.original: 自分をこよりだと思い込み始めてしまった。
subtitles.english: She's starting to believe she's Koyori.

subtitles.original: こよりもらいたい。
subtitles.english: I want Koyori's.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？w
subtitles.english: Are you okay? lol

subtitles.original: それ醤油だから！！
subtitles.english: That's soy sauce!!

subtitles.original: 醤油飲まないで！！
subtitles.english: Don't drink the soy sauce!!

subtitles.original: ここで、もう一本。
subtitles.english: Here's another bottle.

subtitles.original: 約50年もの間、洞窟で眠っていた日本酒。
subtitles.english: A sake that has been sleeping in a cave for about 50 years.

subtitles.original: 当時、鑑評会に出品する最高のお酒を、
subtitles.english: At that time, the best sake to be exhibited at the competition...

subtitles.original: ビール瓶に詰めて取っていたものだそうですよ。
subtitles.english: ...was apparently stored in beer bottles.

subtitles.original: おぉー、すごい！これ。
subtitles.english: Ooh, this is amazing.

subtitles.original: 歴史ありますね。
subtitles.english: It has quite a history.

subtitles.original: 瓶にビールって書いてあるけど、ビールじゃない！
subtitles.english: It says "beer" on the bottle, but it's not beer!

subtitles.original: こちらがいくらですか？
subtitles.english: How much is this one?

subtitles.original: こちらはお値段、
subtitles.english: The price for this one is...

subtitles.original: 30万円です。
えぇー！！これも30万するの！？
subtitles.english: Eh!! This one costs 300,000 yen too!?

subtitles.original: やばーい！！
subtitles.english: No way!!

subtitles.original: 色が、色がだいぶ違いますね。
subtitles.english: The color, the color is quite different.

subtitles.original: 古酒ですからね。かなり色が...
subtitles.english: It's because it's aged sake. The color is quite...

subtitles.original: え、これってなんだっけ？
subtitles.english: Wait, what was this again?

subtitles.original: これなんだっけ？日本酒？
subtitles.english: What was it? Sake?

subtitles.original: あぁ、日本酒かw 日本酒のコーナーだから。
subtitles.english: Ah, sake, right. lol It's the sake corner after all.

subtitles.original: 色ついてるパターンもありえるのか...
subtitles.english: So a colored version is possible too...

subtitles.original: 古酒は大体、黄色くなりますからね。
subtitles.english: Aged sake usually turns yellow, you know.

subtitles.original: そうなんだ。有名な話か。
subtitles.english: I see. Is that common knowledge?

subtitles.original: 香りもちょっと、酸っぱ味のある感じ。
subtitles.english: The scent also has a bit of an acidic feel.

subtitles.original: 匂い嗅いでみてください。
subtitles.english: Please, try smelling it.

subtitles.original: いーー！！！
subtitles.english: Eeeh!!!

subtitles.original: 何？何？その反応は何？
subtitles.english: What? What? What's with that reaction?

subtitles.original: 酸っぱ！！
subtitles.english: Sour!!

subtitles.original: 酸っぱくてびっくりしたのね。びっくりした。
subtitles.english: It was so sour it surprised you. Surprised.

subtitles.original: バルサミコ酢？
subtitles.english: Balsamic vinegar?

subtitles.original: なんか訛ってますけど大丈夫ですか？
subtitles.english: You're speaking with an accent, are you okay?

subtitles.original: バルサミコ酢？
subtitles.english: Balsamic vinegar?

subtitles.original: いつも以上に訛ってますけどw
subtitles.english: You're accent is stronger than usual. lol

subtitles.original: かんぱーい！！
subtitles.english: Cheers!!

subtitles.original: どうですか？お味は。
subtitles.english: How is it? The taste.

subtitles.original: まぁ、まぁ、ちょっとずつ、ちょっとずつね。
subtitles.english: Well, well, little by little, little by little.

subtitles.original: はい。味の実況して。どうですか？
subtitles.english: Yes. Give us a taste report. How is it?

subtitles.original: バルサミコ酢？
subtitles.english: Balsamic vinegar?

subtitles.original: 良いのか？それでw
subtitles.english: Is that okay? Saying that? lol

subtitles.original: バルサミコ酢？30万ですけど？
subtitles.english: Balsamic vinegar? It's 300,000 yen, you know?

subtitles.original: え、こよりちゃん、どう？
subtitles.english: Wait, Koyori-chan, how is it?

subtitles.original: 古酒ならではの深い味がするんですけど、
subtitles.english: It has that deep flavor unique to aged sake...

subtitles.original: 後味スッキリしてるから、めちゃめちゃ飲みやすい！
subtitles.english: But the aftertaste is so clean, it's incredibly easy to drink!

subtitles.original: レポーターや！ソムリエ？
subtitles.english: What a reporter! A sommelier?

subtitles.original: 案件来てる？すごい！
subtitles.english: Are you getting sponsorship deals? Amazing!

subtitles.original: え、これをさ、飲ませてくれてありがとうね。
subtitles.english: Hey, thank you for letting me drink this.

subtitles.original: 貴重なお酒を。まだ終わりじゃない！まだ終わりじゃない！
subtitles.english: Such rare sake. But it's not over yet! Not over yet!

subtitles.original: まだあるの！？
subtitles.english: There's more!?

subtitles.original: まだあるん〜！！まだ前半戦なんだ！！
subtitles.english: There's more!! This is still only the first half!!

subtitles.original: はい、前半戦か。後半戦もあるんで。
subtitles.english: Right, the first half. There's a second half too.

subtitles.original: 誰もルール聞いてなかったですからね。忘れちゃった。
subtitles.english: No one was listening to the rules. I completely forgot.

subtitles.original: はい、ここで！
subtitles.english: Alright, and now!

subtitles.original: 宴会にはもってこいの！ゲームを用意してありまーす！
subtitles.english: Perfect for a banquet! I've prepared a game!

subtitles.original: なんだ？なになに？
subtitles.english: What is it? What, what?

subtitles.original: 王様だーれだ！
subtitles.english: Who is the King!

subtitles.original: 違う、違う。待って、待って。まだ、まだ。
subtitles.english: No, no. Wait, wait. Not yet, not yet.

subtitles.original: それ違う！
subtitles.english: That's not it!

subtitles.original: それでは！
subtitles.english: And now!

subtitles.original: ツイスターゲーム！！イェーイ！！
subtitles.english: Twister game!! Yay!!
